name: doriath.vim
summary: a nice mellow dark green scheme
description:
This theme is _loosely_ based on my old friend the desert colorscheme, but is geared more toward a forest-green/sea-green appearance.
This colorscheme was tested only in GVIM so I have no clue what it does in terminal vim.
install_details: place the \\\"doriath.vim\\\" file in your $VIM/colors/ directory and select it with \\\"color doriath\\\" in your gvimrc file

versions.release_notes: Made some changes to make it less like 'desert' and more like what I wanted, but didn't have time to implement the other day.
cleaned up some syntax and superfluous comments, tested with Gvim 7.0.
